title: Handle a Retailer Going Out of Business
description: A retail customer has gone out of business and has outstanding invoices. An agent must attempt to collect the final payment.

tasks.description: Identify the retailer and their outstanding balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the retailer's account and list of open invoices.

tasks.description: Contact the retailer to arrange for final payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent attempts to contact the retailer.

tasks.description: If payment cannot be secured, write off the bad debt and close the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes a bad debt write-off and deactivates the customer account.
